title: Greek salad (xoriatiki salata)
ingredients: ['2 large beef tomatoes (please only those)', '1/2 cucumber, peeled', '1 green pepper, deseeded', '1 medium onion', '10 black Kalamata olives', '100g feta cheese (sheep or goat preferable)', 'Plenty of extra virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons vinegar, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano']
